name: name of the command in english no more than 50 char long and no space special char or uppercase
default_permissions: One of the RemotePermissionType in command_register/command_structure if perm is set to true

args.name: name of the option in english no more than 50 char long and no space special char or uppercase
args.command_type: One of the RemoteCommandOptionType in command_register/command_structure

localised_args.name: 1st duplicate of the name and desc of the option in english after it the other translation

localised.name: 1st duplicate of the name and desc of the command in english after it the other translation
